string-array.name: division_description
string-array.item: Ahsan Manzil was the official residential palace and seat of the Nawab of Dhaka.The building is situated at Kumartoli along the banks of the Buriganga River in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

The Curzon Hall is a British Raj-era building and home of the Faculty of Sciences at the University of Dhaka.The building was originally intended to be a town hall and is named after Mr Curzon, the Viceroy of India who laid its foundation stone in 1904.
Chottogram is a division of Bangladesh
